fields.title: Group travel planning app
fields.tldr: Make it easier to plan trips with a group
fields.description: Everyone knows how hard it is to plan trips with friends. It will collect feedback, remind people to fill out things and collect money from everyone

fields.title: Find a wedding venue
fields.tldr: Everyone knows how hard it is to find a wedding venue
fields.description: We are making it a lot easier for everyone to find venues that you love
